summary:
Understand and interpret poetry. Study poetic forms, rhythm, rhyme, imagery, and how to analyze meaning. This lesson provides comprehensive coverage of the topic with practical examples and hands-on activities. Students will gain a deep understanding through interactive learning materials and real-world applications. The lesson includes detailed explanations, visual aids, and assessment tools to ensure mastery of the concepts.

The material is designed to build a strong foundation for further learning and practical application in real-world contexts.
